key_id.title: Key ID
key_id.description: Appstore Key ID. See the docs for more information on how to obtain this key.

private_key.title: Private Key
private_key.description: Appstore Private Key. See the docs for more information on how to obtain this key.

issuer_id.title: Issuer ID
issuer_id.description: Appstore Issuer ID. See the docs for more information on how to obtain this ID.

vendor.title: Vendor ID
vendor.description: Appstore Vendor ID. See the docs for more information on how to obtain this ID.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: UTC date and time in the format 2017-01-25T00:00:00Z. Any data before this date will not be replicated.
